translation.en: I talk to the animals and the animals talk to me.
translation.zh:
‎我跟动物说话 动物也跟我说话 ‎（雅娜·梅尔胡本强克思
‎宠物灵媒）

translation.en: And I'm very, very famous here in South Africa.
translation.zh: ‎我在南非这里非常非常的有名

translation.en: I grew up on a farm in Zimbabwe.
translation.zh: ‎我在津巴布韦的一个农场上长大

translation.en: My father had a farm.
translation.zh: ‎我的父亲曾经拥有一个农场

translation.en: I was surrounded by animals as a young girl,
translation.zh:
‎我还是个小女孩的时候
‎身边就到处是动物

translation.en: and I could talk to them even then.
translation.zh: ‎我那个时候就能跟它们对话了

translation.en: I could telepathically connect with the animals in a way that...
translation.zh:
‎我能与动物们
‎以一种心灵感应的形式交流

translation.en: no one else could.
translation.zh: ‎别人都做不到

translation.en: We had many animals. We had farm animals, dogs, cats.
translation.zh:
‎我们有很多动物
‎我们有农场动物 狗啊 猫啊

translation.en: We had our very own pet aardvark.
translation.zh: ‎我们还有只宠物土豚

translation.en: Natasha the Aardvark, who I loved very, very much.
translation.zh:
‎小土豚娜塔莎
‎我非常非常爱她

translation.en: I knew my calling even as a young girl.
translation.zh:
‎我还是个小女孩的时候
‎就知道自己的使命了

translation.en: I was put on this Earth to talk to the animals.
translation.zh:
‎我被放到这个地球上来
‎就是要与动物对话的

translation.en: I moved into crime work,
translation.zh: ‎我参与到了犯罪调查中 审问那些

translation.en: interviewing pets who had witnessed crimes or perpetrated crimes.
translation.zh: ‎我参与到了犯罪调查中 审问那些 ‎目击了犯罪 或自己犯罪的宠物

translation.en: These days I work with South Africa's leading soap stars,
translation.zh: ‎如今 我在帮南非一线的肥皂剧明星

translation.en: pop stars, sports stars, movie stars, any kind of star.
translation.zh:
‎歌星、体育明星、电影明星
‎任何种类的明星做事

translation.en: If you've heard of them, I've worked with them.
translation.zh: ‎（雅娜！加油呀） ‎只要你听说过的人 我就帮过

translation.en: If you're famous in South Africa and your pet has mental problems,
translation.zh:
‎如果你在南非很有名
‎而你的鸽子有了心理问题

translation.en: I'm the one you call.
translation.zh: ‎我就是你要找的人

translation.en: Simple as that.
translation.zh: ‎就这么简单

translation.en: Hello, Jonty. How are you?
translation.zh: ‎你好 小快活 你怎么样呀？

translation.en: He's very angry that you brought me here.
translation.zh: ‎他对你把我叫来这点非常生气

translation.en: He's telling me he doesn't like your stripey t-shirt.
translation.zh: ‎他在跟我说 他不喜欢你的条纹T恤

translation.en: He says that you wear them all the time.
translation.zh: ‎他说你总穿成这样

translation.en: You have those stripey pajamas?
translation.zh: ‎你还有些条纹睡衣？

translation.en: He doesn't like those, either.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-他也不喜欢那些

translation.en: Yes, I've just had a treatment done, no.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我刚去做过头发

translation.en: When did you get your hair done? Well, it looks very nice.
translation.zh:
‎你上次做头发是什么时候？
‎看上去非常棒呢

translation.en: Hello, my donkey. Hello, Charlie. Hello.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我的小驴 你好查理 你好呀

translation.en: Okay, he's telling me that he doesn't like when you say "ee-orr."
translation.zh: ‎好的 他跟我说 他不喜欢你说“咿喔” ‎咿喔！

translation.en: You don't like that, do you? Yes, he's--
translation.zh:
‎你不喜欢这样 是吧？
‎是的 他在…

translation.en: I hate to say it, but he's calling you the C-word right now.
translation.zh:
‎我不想说
‎但是他现在骂你B开头的那个字

translation.en: Right this way.
translation.zh: ‎（瑞吉·库克 公开参观） ‎这边请

translation.en: My name's Quentin Cook. I'm 29 and I'm in real estate.
translation.zh:
‎我叫昆汀·库克 今年29岁
‎我在地产界工作

translation.en: So, how are you? Yeah, good. Quentin Cook. Good to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎你好吗？我很好
‎昆汀·库克 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Sorry, mate, I'll just get a number.
translation.zh: ‎打扰一下 朋友 让我记个号码

translation.en: I work with my dad and I'm about to take over as CEO.
translation.zh:
‎我和我爸一起工作
‎我很快就要接手做CEO了

translation.en: The breakfast nook there and a butler's sink here.
translation.zh: ‎早餐台在那里 然后这里是管家水槽

translation.en: Ticking a lot of boxes for you, is it, Sue? That’s Miele throughout.
translation.zh:
‎是不是符合很多你们的要求啊 苏？
‎这些家电都是美诺牌的

translation.en: Yeah, you can tell by the veins in it.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你从纹路上就能看出来

translation.en: Whether you're up-sizing, down-sizing, or whatever-sizing,
translation.zh:
‎不管您是要搬大房、搬小房
‎还是搬什么房

translation.en: Reg Cook Real Estate, we've got your back.
translation.zh: ‎瑞吉·库克地产公司 我们会帮您

translation.en: Reg Cook. We're here for you.
translation.zh: ‎瑞吉·库克 让我们为您服务

translation.en: And we're family.
translation.zh: ‎我们是一家人

translation.en: Like it's not a problem, but me and my brothers,
translation.zh:
‎这不是个大问题
‎不过我和我的兄弟们

translation.en: we've all got massive arses,
translation.zh: ‎我们屁股都很大

translation.en: So, I don't reckon I realized I had a big arse
translation.zh: ‎所以我想 直到我大概十岁的时候

translation.en: till I was about, like, ten years old and just, like, saw it.
translation.zh: ‎我才意识到我的屁股很大 ‎（昆汀·库克 地产经纪）

translation.en: Like, it sticks out a fair bit, but you just get used to it.
translation.zh: ‎它稍微有那么点突出 但你会习惯的

translation.en: -It's just... It's who we are. -Yeah, we all have it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们就是这样
‎-是啊 我们都有它

translation.en: Like, even our Grandpa Reg had one back in the day.
translation.zh: ‎即使是我们的爷爷瑞吉当年也有一个

translation.en: Yeah, like, our Grandpa's arse is, like, the biggest arse of all of ours.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 那个…
‎-是的 爷爷的屁股 ‎我们之中最大的屁股

translation.en: Like, it's in the genes, obviously.
translation.zh: ‎显然 这都在我们的基因库里

translation.en: Yeah, like literally in the jeans.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 就在我们的“裤里”

translation.en: I don't get that. What do you mean?
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 哪里好笑了？

translation.en: Fantastic features like the chandelier, too.
translation.zh: ‎装饰都很棒 比如这盏吊灯

translation.en: So, I'll let you have a look around. Great to talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎那我让您四处看看 很高兴与您交谈

translation.en: Hello. How we going there? Good?
translation.zh: ‎你们好吗？幸会幸会 给

translation.en: Being a real estate agent is about connecting in a legit way with people.
translation.zh:
‎做一名地产经纪最重要的是
‎与人们建立起一种真正的关系

translation.en: Give that to Dad. It's my card.
translation.zh: ‎把这给爸爸 我的名片

translation.en: You could whack a vertical garden up there if you wanted to. You wanted one.
translation.zh:
‎你可以在这里弄一个垂直花园
‎如果你想的话

translation.en: You have to sort of, like, win people's trust.
translation.zh: ‎你必须要赢得人的信任

translation.en: Like you can't bullshit.
translation.zh: ‎你不能吹牛

translation.en: And this is the oversized bathroom here, too, with the mock black granite.
translation.zh:
‎这边就是超大号的厕所
‎瞧瞧这些黑色的仿花岗岩

translation.en: You gotta keep it real.
translation.zh: ‎你必须得实话实说

translation.en: These are real.
translation.zh: ‎这些是真的

translation.en: The his and hers sinks over there,
translation.zh: ‎那里是双人水池

translation.en: if he-- if she lets you use the "his" side of it.
translation.zh:
‎如果他…
‎如果她让你用属于你的这边的话

translation.en: 'Cause she'll probably take over it, knowing chicks.
translation.zh:
‎因为以我对妹子们的了解
‎估计两边都是她的了

translation.en: So, I don't know. Is it ticking a lot of boxes for you guys, or...?
translation.zh:
‎那个 这里是不是满足了
‎你们很多的条件呀 还是…

translation.en: Open houses can get a bit same old, same old,
translation.zh: ‎公开参观日有时候有点重复乏味

translation.en: so you gotta come up with ways to, like, vibe it up,
translation.zh:
‎所以你得想出各种办法
‎把气氛闹起来

translation.en: so I dabble in DJing a bit.
translation.zh: ‎所以我略懂一些DJ

translation.en: Yeah, so real estate can be a pretty sick job
translation.zh: ‎嗯 地产经纪可以是份很犀利的工作

translation.en: if you know what you're doing.
translation.zh: ‎如果你知道该怎么做的话

translation.en: Well, as far as I know, this is the first time she's agreed to talk to anybody in ages.
translation.zh:
‎据我所知 这是好久以来的第一次
‎她同意接受别人的采访

translation.en: Yeah, she was really a big deal back then.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 当年她是个很了不得的人物 ‎（朗达·卡迈克尔 前模特）

translation.en: You know, Joycey was famous.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟乔伊斯很出名

translation.en: Course, we started out modeling together,
translation.zh:
‎我们一起做模特出道
‎但焦点主要在乔伊斯身上

translation.en: but it was all Joyce, you know, she was the beauty.
translation.zh:
‎我们一起做模特出道
‎但焦点主要在乔伊斯身上 ‎她是美的那个

translation.en: The photographers, well, they just simply adored her.
translation.zh: ‎摄影师们都对她喜欢得不得了

translation.en: We were both Page 3 Girls for a little while,
translation.zh: ‎我们俩都做过“第三页”女郎

translation.en: and it was all just very innocent stuff.
translation.zh: ‎都是一些很单纯的东西

translation.en: Joycey...
translation.zh: ‎乔伊斯

translation.en: she sort of went down a darker path.
translation.zh: ‎她算是走上了一条比较黑暗的道路

translation.en: She became Australia's most famous porn star.
translation.zh: ‎她称为了澳大利亚最有名的艳星

translation.en: It was mostly arty stuff, though.
translation.zh: ‎不过都是些很艺术性的东西

translation.en: Juicy Joyce? Every man's dream girl.
translation.zh:
‎（乔伊斯·杰弗里斯
‎《乔伊斯那下面》） ‎水灵灵的乔伊斯
‎每个男人的梦中情人

translation.en: Oh, but... yeah, it's all ancient history now.
translation.zh: ‎喔 可是…现在这都是历史了

translation.en: Give me the mail. I'm the Hamburglar.
translation.zh: ‎把信给我 我是汉堡大盗

translation.en: Ah, of course I remember Joyce.
translation.zh: ‎啊 我当然记得乔伊斯了

translation.en: Any bloke my age would.
translation.zh: ‎任何我这年纪的爷们都记得

translation.en: Yeah, she did a lot of stick flicks back then.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 她当年拍了不少毛片

translation.en: Joyce Goes Bush, Joyce Down Under,
translation.zh:
‎《乔伊斯的黑森林》
‎《乔伊斯那下面》

translation.en: Joyce Gets Randy,
translation.zh: ‎《乔伊斯骚起来了》

translation.en: Streuth It's Joyce, yeah, I love that one.
translation.zh:
‎《哎呦！乔伊斯来了》
‎嗯 那部是我的最爱

translation.en: She was absolute sex on legs.
translation.zh: ‎她简直就是活生生的性爱本身

translation.en: Still lovely today, actually.
translation.zh: ‎今天依旧风韵犹存 说实话

translation.en: Just a quick reminder, ladies and gentlemen, that the mail is here.
translation.zh: ‎顺便提醒一下 女士们先生们 信来了

translation.en: I repeat, the mail is here.
translation.zh: ‎重复一遍 信来了

translation.en: I understand why you guys are here.
translation.zh: ‎我明白你们为什么来

translation.en: You're here to find out what I'm like now.
translation.zh:
‎你们来这里是想看我现在怎么样了 ‎（乔伊斯·杰弗里斯
‎前成人片明星）

translation.en: "What is she like? Remember her from back in the day?"
translation.zh:
‎“她现在怎么样了？
‎记得当年的她么？”

translation.en: -Yeah. -And let me tell you,
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-那我告诉你

translation.en: I don't give two rats.
translation.zh: ‎我他喵的不在乎

translation.en: -Yeah you do. You care. -I don't give two rats,
translation.zh:
‎-才不是 你很在乎
‎-我他喵地才不在乎

translation.en: 'cause I know why you're really here.
translation.zh: ‎因为我知道你们为什么要来

translation.en: You're here to see the collection.
translation.zh: ‎你们来这里是想看我的收藏的

translation.en: When I show you my collection, you're gonna shit your pants.
translation.zh:
‎要是我给你们看了我的收藏
‎保证会吓尿了你们

translation.en: -Seriously. It's that good. -It really is.
translation.zh: ‎真的 就有这么棒

translation.en: Let's have a look. I wanna show you. On your feet!
translation.zh:
‎-的确
‎-带你们看一圈 ‎我带你们看 站起来！

translation.en: Get a load of it. This is all my stuff.
translation.zh: ‎尽情看吧 这都是我的东西

translation.en: Albino rubber bands.
translation.zh: ‎白化病人的手环

translation.en: There's some of Dad's dolls. I don't love 'em.
translation.zh: ‎这些是爸爸的娃娃 我不喜欢它们

translation.en: Keyrings. These are my corn cob holders.
translation.zh: ‎钥匙环 这些是我的玉米棒子架

translation.en: This is the kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎这里是厨房

translation.en: So, what it is-- My birds.
translation.zh: ‎所以这些是 我的鸟

translation.en: What I like about these-- This is a cockatoo.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢这些的地方是…
‎这是只美冠鹦鹉

translation.en: This is my favorite. Laughing cockatoo. This is a pink cockatoo.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的最爱 在笑的美冠鹦鹉 ‎这是只粉红色的美冠鹦鹉

translation.en: This is actually a galah.
translation.zh: ‎这其实是只粉红凤头鹦鹉

translation.en: What I like about it is it's actually got a crest on it, which is not true.
translation.zh:
‎我最喜欢这只的一点是 它有个冠 ‎这点是不对的
‎粉红凤头鹦鹉其实是没有冠的

translation.en: Galahs don't have crests on 'em, so...
translation.zh:
‎这点是不对的
‎粉红凤头鹦鹉其实是没有冠的

translation.en: Do you want some Juicy Fruit at all, anyone on the crew?
translation.zh:
‎你们想要吃点黄箭口香糖么？
‎拍摄组的各位？

translation.en: No? All good?
translation.zh: ‎不要？不用了？

translation.en: These postcards are actually--
translation.zh: ‎这些其实是明星片 我写给自己的

translation.en: I sent them to myself, 'cause I don't have a lot of friends.
translation.zh: ‎这些其实是明星片 我写给自己的 ‎因为我朋友不多

translation.en: And these are my matches.
translation.zh: ‎这些是我的火柴

translation.en: Oh, so much stuff in here, I just can't even get my head around it.
translation.zh:
‎喔 这里有太多东西了
‎我都没办法搞清楚

translation.en: Spoons over there.
translation.zh: ‎勺子在那边

translation.en: What else we got?
translation.zh: ‎我们还有什么呢？

translation.en: So, this is the museum.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 这里就是博物馆

translation.en: This is where I'm gonna put all the collection
translation.zh: ‎这里就是我以后放收藏的地方

translation.en: when people are gonna come buy tickets to see it.
translation.zh: ‎到时候人们会买票来看

translation.en: Oh, but it's not finished yet, but it's just gonna be, like,
translation.zh: ‎虽然现在还没有完成 但这里将会是

translation.en: cream of the crop of the collection all displayed along there. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎收藏里面百里挑一的东西
‎都放在这里 嗯

translation.en: Oh, bloody Nora. See those birds up there? Those grey ones?
translation.zh:
‎呃 额滴神啊
‎看到上面那些鸟了吗？那些灰色的

translation.en: See them? They have been staring at me.
translation.zh: ‎看到了吗？它们一直在盯着我

translation.en: They just-- They have cameras in their eyes
translation.zh: ‎它们的眼睛里有镜头似的

translation.en: and they stare at me and they store information on disks.
translation.zh: ‎它们盯着我看 把信息存在光盘里

translation.en: Stupid bloody bird. Eat seed, bitches!
translation.zh: ‎妈的蠢鸟！吃种子去吧 贱人们！

translation.en: Can't stand you!
translation.zh: ‎真受不了你们！

translation.en: Bloody idiots!
translation.zh: ‎他妈的笨蛋！

translation.en: Stupid drongos!
translation.zh: ‎蠢卷尾！

translation.en: My Kate Bush cupboard.
translation.zh: ‎我的凯特·布什壁橱

translation.en: Come on into the tape room.
translation.zh: ‎进录影室来吧

translation.en: This is my tape room where I record everything.
translation.zh:
‎这是我的录影室
‎我的东西都是在这里拍的

translation.en: My scrunchie drawer.
translation.zh: ‎我的发束抽屉

translation.en: So what it is, it's a whole lot of scrunchies.
translation.zh: ‎这里面其实是好多发束

translation.en: And it's a scrunchie for every day.
translation.zh: ‎每天都有一个发束

translation.en: So what I do, is I'll just put a scrunchie in...
translation.zh: ‎我是这样的 我找个发束戴上

translation.en: like that.
translation.zh: ‎像这样

translation.en: And that should-- I'll wear that for the day.
translation.zh: ‎这样就好了 我一天就戴着它了

translation.en: Oh, there's this. My keyboard.
translation.zh: ‎喔 还有这个 我的电子琴

translation.en: I feel like every little thing deserves to be loved. Anyway...
translation.zh:
‎我认为每一件小东西
‎都值得被爱 不说了

translation.en: It's a waterbed.
translation.zh: ‎这是张水床

translation.en: Ooh, yes! I love it!
translation.zh: ‎太棒了！我爱死它了！

translation.en: Rhonda, make sure they don't steal anything out there.
translation.zh: ‎朗达 看好了别让他们在外面偷东西

translation.en: Get back or I'll have your eye out.
translation.zh: ‎回来 不然我把你眼睛挖出来

translation.en: This guy here's my father, Charles.
translation.zh: ‎这里的这个家伙 是我父亲查尔斯

translation.en: He's the one that rescued me from my bad times,
translation.zh:
‎就是他把我
‎从我那段不好的时光里拯救了出来

translation.en: but we don't want to talk about that, do we?
translation.zh: ‎但我们可不想说起那些事 对吧？

translation.en: We actually lost him a couple of years ago.
translation.zh: ‎我们几年前失去了他

translation.en: Shush! Enough said.
translation.zh: ‎嘘！够了！

translation.en: -Your lips will be zipped. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-说了把嘴闭好了
‎-嗯

translation.en: Most of my collection's actually my father's, Charles.
translation.zh: ‎我这些收藏其实是我父亲 查尔斯的

translation.en: -He did all the collecting. -No, you had input, darling.
translation.zh: ‎主要是他收集的 ‎不 你也有贡献 亲爱的

translation.en: -Well, I'm his helper, Rhonda. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-我只是帮帮他 朗达
‎-嗯

translation.en: And this is my dad's precious teddy.
translation.zh: ‎这是我爸爸真爱的泰迪

translation.en: This is the most important thing in the whole collection.
translation.zh: ‎这是整个收藏里最重要的东西

translation.en: It was my dad’s when he was little.
translation.zh: ‎这是我爸爸小时候的小熊

translation.en: You're not even supposed to touch it,
translation.zh: ‎你都不允许去能碰它一下

translation.en: but sometimes I do like to hold the teddy's hand.
translation.zh: ‎但有时候我很喜欢握着泰迪的手

translation.en: Anyway, come on.
translation.zh: ‎好了 来吧

translation.en: You can't catch the gingerbread lady!
translation.zh: ‎你是捉不到姜饼女士的！

translation.en: There's more to see.
translation.zh: ‎这里还有东西看
